website_summaries.verdict: A fine choice for those who are space-conscious. An excellent budget choice.
pros: Portable and perfect for tight spaces
Every piece is machine washable, and the harness straps at 5 points
cons: All-plastic unit feels a bit flimsy
Tray requires two hands to operate
Seating area is small and does not fit all babies

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Poor safety.My baby got his finger stucked into the tray!
customer_reviews.author: sheila Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this highchair! It’s perfect for smaller spaces and is so functional! We had been using our older child’s (now 3) highchair for our 6 month old but it just wasn’t a great fit for her because she’s very small. This one is adjustable and I love that the entire thing can be washed! The tray is also great with a spot for a cup and additional items! Update: after washing the cover just ONE time, part of the back tore open. I’m so upset because obviously that part is going to need to be washed a lot. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw! Littl Fingers get stick under the tray!
customer_reviews.text: My baby gets her fingers caught under the tray. This has happened multiple times- last time put dents in her finger nails, tore skin, and tons of crying- I’m returning it!
customer_reviews.author: ErinPinSL

customer_reviews.title: TRAY
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD NOT NOT RECOMMEND THIS HIGH CHAIR it was amazing when my baby first started eating she is now 10 months n picks up her food an when she was holding the side of the tray while eating the pull out thing smashed her figure I don't know if this chair tray was not right but this is twice dirt time the small tray hurt her little fingers very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Heliton

customer_reviews.title: Can’t return
customer_reviews.text: First of all we took it out of the box to set it up and it’s very unsteady which is surprising and it won’t go back into the box so we can ship it back we took it to the UPS store and three different people could not get it back into the box and I’m not purchasing a box for $15 to return this thing and with no way to really reach customer service I’m stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Renee Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Check measurements first
customer_reviews.text: I never actually used this high chair, but that’s because the product description did not specify that I would need certain measurements for the chair base that it would be strapped to. My dining chairs were too short to use with this seat so I returned it without a thought. Would rather not chance a dangerous fall. It seemed like a nice, sturdy chair. I just wish the description had the same measurements that come in the owners manual so I didn’t waste time waiting for an item that was useless to me, only to waste more time taking it back to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Awful, not the original space saver highchair!
customer_reviews.text: I had the space saver highchair style from about 8 yrs ago, this is NOT the same. The back of the seat is the only portion that reclines, not the whole seat unit, making this unusable for a newborn. This is the cheapest feeling highchair. The back of the seat easily pulls of constantly and the tray hardly stays in place. Supposedly your supposed to be able to raise the seat, the seat doesnt raise. My mother in law has the same seat, hers also doesnt raise. I would never recommend this seat and if I still had the box I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high chair for space savers. We just moved from a 2 bed house into a 1 bedroom apartment and needed something that wouldn't take up much room. I LOVE the pink and grey print on the cushion. This easily comes off to get washed if needed. The only thing I have not liked as much is sliding and connecting the tray feels a bit flimsy and doesn't always attach easily... Other than that, we love this highchair and i recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: The old version is better
customer_reviews.text: We have an older version as well and needed a second. While this one looks nicer, the quality seems cheaper. It’s hard to get the tray onto the chair. It says a child using it can be up to 50 pounds, but my 24 lb kid can just about fit, it’s right up against her belly.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: As described! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and disassemble. Having a removable tray is very useful. You can throw it in the dishwasher after every time baby eats something. I like height adjustments. It is leveled with standard height of a dinner table. Another good feature I like is that you can also leave it on the ground without any chair. It also reclines. The only disadvantage is that it doesn’t fold small like other folding baby chairs but where not worried about it until the baby outgrows. We keep it assembled always.
customer_reviews.author: Murat

customer_reviews.title: 2 Features do not perform as described
customer_reviews.text: (1) EXTREMELY difficult to change height; I have yet to be able to. (2) Tray does NOT store behind the chair as shown in video; no way to secure it so it just falls out. (3) Be careful if grabbing seat from top as it's very easy to unhinge the top section. I do like that it provides both infant and toddler options and that it is easier to store than a rolling high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: Can’t disassemble easily and seat won’t raise
customer_reviews.text: The damn seat won’t raise. I have tried and tried and the latch just doesn’t pull out far enough to be able to raise the seat. I gave up and just left it in the lower position. Quite annoying. I also noticed the finger safety with the tray. Have to pull babies hands up and out of the way while putting it on. I also hate the fact you can’t easily disassemble when wanting to store it. You have to unscrew it all and it’s a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Shropshire

customer_reviews.title: A must for any home if you have littles who visit.
customer_reviews.text: What a great purchase for our 7 month old grandson. So lightweight and portable. I love it that all the components can go in the dishwasher. Our little man thinks he’s such a big boy when he sits with us at the table in this high chair. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Pros: space saver, easy to clean, cute, soft, the design isn’t super loud. Cons: tray is a pain to slide and clip on, doesn’t fit under a table like it claims to do so. The tray you have to pull and make sure it’s lined up and then push in the tabs so it clips on. Lost a star due to the tray and the fact the chair doesn’t fit under the table without the tray on. My 4m old seems to like the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Our 5-month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5-month old will be starting solids next month and because we have a small dining room we didn't want a big chair. We decided this would be the best choice. It is great! Our little one is starting to sit with help and this chair is very comfortable for him. He gets to sit with us at the dinner table :) Extremelly easy to put together, doesn't use much space, very easy to clean, I really love it! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Toddler rocking chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have a space saving high chair with a normal size tray as I had been using a travel high chair but food was going everywhere but on the high chair. It is easy to set up and clean. I don't like that the seat sits pretty far forward from the back of the chair. This has made it into a rocking device for my two year old. I was also hoping it would fit in under the table but it doesn't (not a fault of the product) so it doesn't actually save much space for me. I am going to switch to a traditional high chair that I can fold up compactly between meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Living in a condo i got threw high chairs for my shower. I wanted a nice sleek one but for storage purposes they arent good for condos becAuse how big and bulky they are. This chair meets all my expectations and more worth every penny!! I can put him on my table to feed him, outside, in it living-room or on the floor. Absolutely love this chair i got rid of my high chaira and kept this one
customer_reviews.author: Elma Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this over my regular high chair. We have a little breakfast table in our kitchen we most often use and the regular high chair took up so much unnecessary space with how wide the legs are etc. this fits right into the chair that is at the table and takes up no more space than what was already there! I do wish the tray was a little bigger though cause some of his toys and things won't fit on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable chair for a strong 8-month old boy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife amd I can use this chair for baby sitting chores associated with our Great Grandson when we have him over for a visit. We olace it on our bed and play with him or feed him. Very stable on our mattress thus preventing him from falling over while being fed some baby food. Well made great product. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CGYjr

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, well made, easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat! I don't have room in my kitchen for a high chair... But I do have room in my dining room for this! It's extremely easy to remove the cover and Straps to wash, my baby is comfortable, the tray has a separate insert so you don't always have to wash the whole thing. It's easy to strap to the chair. It also is adjustable so the baby can sit at the table but still use his tray. The shoulder and waist straps stay together (if you want them to) which is also very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Castner

customer_reviews.title: Convenient high chair for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is perfect for our small dining room. I love that it leans back and the cute cover is really easy to clean. Baby food wipes right off. Crumbs can get trapped under the cover but it’s easy to lift up and clean out. The compartments on the tray are nice to keep things separated. It’s also convenient that he can use the bottom tray while I take the top one out to clean. Great high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed. We don’t have a formal dining room and our open plan kitchen’s breakfast bar extends into the living room, which is carpeted....so a tradition highchair or one that hangs off the breakfast bar’s counter top was a no-go! This fits nicely on our kitchen counter and is low profile enough to slide under the cupboards when we’re not using it. Perfect solution for a small space!
customer_reviews.author: Richard O. Baize

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this in seat high chair but it is too flimsy. When my daughter sits back in it, the back falls off. The plastic is thin. I was hoping for a sturdy plastic like a regular high chair but just a smaller size to save space. Definitely not what I received. Bummed
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The chair was too easy to assemble. I didn’t read the instructions and it took me less than 3 minutes. Super cute, super simple, and my baby (who hates being in one place) absolutely loves this chair. My favorite part is the fact that the back test extends al the way to his head. He’s the type of baby to try throwing himself back when he’s uncomfortable so I like that it’s physically impossible for him to do this with this chair. Also it’s reclines. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: momzilla

customer_reviews.title: repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am on my fifth baby and we alway get a space saver highchair. I appreciate the modern colors and that it can blend in with my decor. The quality is great and the covers can be washed many times.
customer_reviews.author: mother5

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a lifesaver. My grandbaby loves sitting in it. It's so easy to put together ( 5 -10 minutes) and connected eadily to my oak chair. I have tile floors, so I can even push him around like a high chair with wheels. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Flo

customer_reviews.title: Fits in IKEA STEFAN Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my little one and I was afraid it wouldn't fit in my ikea chair because it looks pretty small (since I live in a small apartment) but fits perfectly without being able to lean it back. If you want it to be able to lean the back support, that might be a little tricky but I only use it to feed her solids while we all eat at the table.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This little chair saved Christmas! Our grandson’s parents were finally able to sit and enjoy entire meals with minimal interruption from their toddler. The chair fit easily on one of my dining room chairs. It was easy to use and very easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: DITAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but dislike the small cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. Small enough for our tiny dining area and easy to store. My 4 month old fits in it really well. Supports him really well too. ONLY DOWNSIDE is that the padding is small so it doesn’t completely cover the high chair. When he sits in it, it pushes it in and shows the plastic part on both the top and bottom. Wish the cover was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best. Good for budget and space saving
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the straps on the top, it’s not as easy to clean because the baby gets the whole tray dirty. Not just the middle insert.
customer_reviews.author: CStetson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love how it grows with the child! I love how it coverts. Love how it can be raised, reclined and has a two part removable tray. I bought one of these about eight years ago I just recently got rid of it only because I needed a new collar for this baby. Totally durable lasted through more than 5 kids 8years later still holding strong!
customer_reviews.author: AiyaRyder

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Good highchair. No problem with fingers getting stuck as in other reviews. Pretty sturdy. Easy to clean. Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't allow a full upright position, it barely has any room for the kid to fit, and if you leave room then the tray is on the last hole and is unstable. I'll be able to use this for about a month max
customer_reviews.author: Kitfox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3 months old plus
customer_reviews.text: My three month old grandchild likes to be part of the action! I strapped this to a kitchen chair and pull it up to the table during our meals. Even though she’s too young for table food she loves seeing our faces and we can easily interact with her. The adjustment feature is great because I can tilt the seat back when she nods off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lavorando

customer_reviews.title: Space saver for sure
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the compact space it saves but it was hard for me to hold my baby while I squeezed the latch to take off the tray, seat her down and slide the tray on.
customer_reviews.author: Charming AF

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bends too much, it’s really unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this chair. It’s so unstable. It feels as if the baby moves forward or to the sides he might fall. I adjusted the straps as much as I could. However the plastic is made must be really cheap because it’s very bendable, I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone. In fact I’ll make them aware of the bad product so the they stay away from it.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: For small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: These works great in our little house. I leave it on one of our extra chairs, so I don't have to find extra room for a full highchair. Like that I don't have to use the shoulder straps since me boys like to chew on them while trying to eat. Did wish it sat up a little straighter, but other than that is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Quail

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean out removable tray
customer_reviews.text: This sits right on top of our table and fits our 25 lb baby. The harness works great and the top tray is removable so we take it out when he's done eating for cleaning. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: If you grab this wrong to move it the top part of the back comes off. Does not support the tray as the box says it does. My 9 month old is almost too big for it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Tray is very difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: After researching booster seats for awhile we decided on this one. It seemed to be the perfect fit for us. Once received and out together we quickly realized we made a mistake! The tray is extremely difficult to align and getting it to stay requires a lot of jiggling in order for it to click. It does. It seem to be made very well either. Super disappointed in this!! On a positive note I will say it is very easy to clean and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: David Flory

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat very comfy for my baby I like the height to be honest I know I can’t push in the chair all the way under my table but I love it And the cushion is cute the tray is easy to clean and I like that it’s deep and has dividers in it (not just flat) and it has a cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: More bigger then old one
customer_reviews.text: I have both (old one and new one) One in the home one in the store (picture is store) This new one is more bigger then old one! All good. My 4month boy really like this chair ‘Insta Aaron_june_kim’ has more photo
customer_reviews.author: JANDI

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this product, it was easy to assemble, fits nicely at our table, takes up minimal space. Durable, easy to clean, kiddos love it!
customer_reviews.author: RedsRomanceReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have baby item. I am so glad I decided to purchase this chair for my baby to sit on. We use it on the floor mostly, but we have used it strapped to a chair as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hizam

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this chair, so I may update later.... I don't know if it is easy to clean, but it was super easy to put together. I did it in 5 minutes. Seems like it will grow with the baby. The one thing I would change is the tray. It should be one handle, not 2. That would make things A LOT easier. I like the pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: It’s dishwasher safe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. Easy to put together and clean. When I bought it I never realized that it was all dishwasher safe! Now that was a golden find lol it’s easy to take part to clean as well. Only thing is I have to put a folded hand towel under her to sit her higher up as it does sorta swollow her up.
customer_reviews.author: Brazillex5

customer_reviews.title: Returning ours
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of this BUT it’s annoying. The back has a piece that clips in on the top and it’s always falling off. They can’t say it’s a defect because we bought two of them for our twins and they both do it. The tray is annoying to get on. It’s suppose to slide on easily but it doesn’t. Also the tray is suppose to sit behind it but it doesn’t. So basically this product is nothing like they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent highchair if you dont want bulky
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great highchair. We put it on our normal chair. It's great if you have alot of seating but if you only have 4 chairs & people over it may take up a chair for someone. Also you want to be careful with them being able to move the chair own their own
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair in that I don’t have to take up space for a high chair. The weird part is my kiddo gets her foot up underneath and can get the one locking action open on one side. So at times she can get the tray off. I like that I can store the tray behind the seat.
customer_reviews.author: alyndsay

customer_reviews.title: F FisherPrice. Get something else
customer_reviews.text: Horrid. Not worth the money or time. Hard to dissemble and came not even able to assembly completely
customer_reviews.author: Korynn

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I had one of those for my daughter and she loved it. But this one is poorly made a lot of places to get fingers stuck. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I’ve ever written for a product that I’ve purchased from Amazon. I feel this product was cheaply made. The pieces wouldn’t stay together and there are gaps, not to mention I can’t get the tray to adjust right. Every time I take my daughter out of it, the top comes up as shown in pictures. It was, however, easy to clean and assemble so I’ll give it some credit. I more than likely wouldn’t recommend this to anyone though.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Space saver for sure
customer_reviews.text: Some one needing a high chair but not alot of space this is the one. Love that it reclines. Leave the infant when they fall asleep eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. Baby can sit in a upright position or you can click the chair into a laid back position. Inner tray detaches for easy cleaning. Love the portability of this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Aila

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time not the charm
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd chair we have gotten with defective parts. The tray is very hard to snap on and requires major wiggling to get it to snap. The 2nd one the smaller tray insert was smashed in.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best small highchair!
customer_reviews.text: Great little highchair. We needed a small portable one, and I didn’t feel like any of the other styles were very safe, but this one works great!
customer_reviews.author: A.H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Infant
customer_reviews.text: Had a high chair but wanted something less bulky. This is perfect for infant to toddler as it transitions to stages as they grow. The tray sets close to baby preventing less mess to fall through and it’s all 100% washable. Cushioned and pretty secure to chair. Love that the tray is deep to prevent spills. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: This was ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Ugly from side point of view. Honestly just Not worth it. I wish I bought something more expensive, cute, and comfortable instead!
customer_reviews.author: s h a n o n

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Our 6 month old sits in it very comfortably. Excellent support. Update after using it for some time now. My only complaint is the straps. We have to use after market seatbelt covers we had over each side otherwise the straps rub against his neck leaving red marks.
customer_reviews.author: TMitch13

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Much better than a conventional high chair. Portable, and easy to clean. Wish I had one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Easy chair all around
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! I like it better than my full size high chair (although not as much as my hook on chair). This cleans easily and my son feels safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have four kids, my younger one really active. I made good choice for this product. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Enkhzaya khadbaatar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact highchair
customer_reviews.text: Love this because we are grandparents and don't need a full size high chair and it puts away so easy when she is not with us . This chair has all the perks of a stand alone high chair. We will also be able to just bring her right up to the table with us to eat with no tray when she is older with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beware seat belt latch is not secure
customer_reviews.text: Safety concern/The seat belt latch easily comes off as the child is in seat. I bought this product for my 8 month old grandson and as I removed the tray to take him out, both seat belts that latched to back of seat came off and thank God I caught him on time or he would have fell to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect space saver high chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair, was easy to assemble, works great, & fits right in our kitchen chair.
customer_reviews.author: B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super great product love it and fits right at the table easy to clean and the tray is very simple. Seat cover is easy to wipe down after a messy meal! Love it also mashing washable perfect product for our family
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one for our house, and we love it! It's small, versatile, easy to clean, and great for my tiny baby. We also ended up order a SECOND one for her grandma's house - we liked it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Chyenne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless intended to use treat
customer_reviews.text: Chair is absolutely awful. When kids sit to eat they tend to lean forward and the plastic piece between the legs irritate their private’s and upper legs. It also doesn’t save space as it stands away from the table.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer holceker

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about 6 months now with no complaint. It's secured very well, it's easy to clean the tray/cloth seat, and baby seems perfectly comfortable. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great High chair
customer_reviews.text: We love the portability and sturdiness of this chair. Works great for our child!
customer_reviews.author: tsb88

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dining spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small dining areas, easy to clean and a great price what else can I say
customer_reviews.author: Casio

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: We use this when our grandkid visits. Secures well. Easy to clean. Doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: JosephTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small house. Fits right on an existing chair. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Corsaro

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall tables/chairs
customer_reviews.text: The straps are the hardest part to clean & we did add some padding to the neck straps. They rubbed our little guys neck so we wanted some more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Zink

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good high chair, seems very sturdy. Easy to put together and looks great, will be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: akirkelie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great alternative to a high chair. It securely attaches to our regular chairs which is great because we have a bar height table. Also easy to transport and I love that the tray and insert are dishwasher safe. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We didn't have room for a full high chair. This fits into our dining chairs and is perfect height for the table. I've never had a high chair this easy to clean! It comes right off and into the washer in seconds. Only downside is it doesn't swivel, but I knew that when I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it’s very sturdy and it got delivered fast 😊
customer_reviews.author: Blush365

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair! I have 2 and I wish I would’ve bought 2 of these instead of the other I bought. My son looks very comfortable, the tray is large (which I like), and you’re able to slide the tray exactly where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile.  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great for using on a chair or as a chair for my 15 month old granddaughter. Highly recommended. Doesn't stain, even with spaghetti. Easy clean and totally comfortable for her. Purchased after good amount of research. Looks brand new after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: FSUCOLEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair. I love that I just put it on the seat and it doesn’t take up lots of space. The fabric is cute and wipeable. I love the tray is large and has another section that comes out. And the option for 5 point harness or 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jamber

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: This only fits securely on chairs that have no contours ...
customer_reviews.text: This only fits securely on chairs that have no contours to them. The tray is a little finicky to put on and I am often worried it will detach if my little one leans forward too far.

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price­ SpaceSaver High Chair
product_meta.description: Color:Green/GreyWith the Fisher-Price SpaceSaver High Chair, you get everything you love from a full-size high chair but in a portable size that fits easily on most dining and restaurant chairs! It has two height adjustments and three recline positions to keep your baby comfortable, and you can transform it into a toddler booster when your little one is ready. And, keeping this high chair clean is super easy, too! The deep-dish design helps keep your little one from pushing food off the tray, and the spill-resistant seat pad and harness are machine washable. Plus, the seat, tray and bonus tray insert are all dishwasher safe, so cleanup is a snap (literally)! Where development comes into play Self-Confidence: High chairs help babies build confidence as they learn to feed themselves and participate in meal time. Security & Happiness: High chairs allow babies to be at eye level with their caregivers, helping them to feel secure & happy. Plus, the cushioned seat and tray keep little ones comfy during meal time.
feature_bullets: All the features of a full size high chair in half the space!
Infant high chair & toddler booster in one: customize with 2 height adjustments & 3 recline positions
Dishwasher-safe seat, tray & bonus tray insert for easy cleanup
Deep-dish tray design helps keep your little one from pushing food off the tray

specifications.Care instructions: Dishwasher-safe seat, tray & bonus tray insert for easy cleanup
